name: Nemo Roamer Sleeping Pad
categories: Sleeping bags, sleeping pads, quilts and pillows
description:
Sink into comfort on a sleeping pad that may just rival your bed at home. The Roamer is a self-inflating pad that has 2 valves for micro-adjustments, so you can dial in the perfect firmness. With more than 10cm plush between you and the ground, you can drift off into dreamland while your tentmates are still counting sheep.Soft fabric top and durable fabric bottom add strength and comfort.Open cell, dual-axis foam core.Integrated toggles connect 2 pads. Two Roamer XL pads make a standard queen-sized mattress.Packs down to half the size of similar pads.Rated for -34°C and up.2 zero-profile valves suck in air for fast set-up, and allow precise adjustments.Vortex™ high-capacity pump sack for fast inflation.One-way dump valve for fast deflation.Includes Vortex pump sack, a Velcro® strap, repair kit and drawstring sack.Covered by Nemo lifetime warranty.
